title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When creating several report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not displayed in the Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: The default values of the report parameters should be shown in the Show Report Parameters' dialog.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
4. Open the Show Report Parameters' dialog and observe that the default values are not displayed.
